Name: Charlatan
Description: You have always had a way with people. You know what makes them tick, you can tease out their hearts' desires after a few minutes of conversation, and with a few leading questions you can read them like they were children's books. It's a useful talent, and one that you're perfectly willing to use for your advantage.

Equipment.3: Tools of the con of your choice (ten stoppered bottles filled with colored liquid, a set of weighted dice, a deck of marked cards, or a signet ring of an imaginary duke)

Feature.False Identity: You have created a second identity that includes documentation, established acquaintances, and disguises that allow you to assume that persona. Additionally, you can forge documents including official papers and personal letters, as long as you have seen an example of the kind of document or the handwriting you are trying to copy.

Favorite Schemes.1: I cheat at games of chance.
Favorite Schemes.2: I shave coins or forge documents.
Favorite Schemes.3: I insinuate myself into people's lives to prey on their weakness and secure their fortunes.
Favorite Schemes.4: I put on new identities like clothes.
Favorite Schemes.5: I run sleight-of-hand cons on street corners.
Favorite Schemes.6: I convince people that worthless junk is worth their hard-earned money.

Personality Trait.1: I fall in and out of love easily, and am always pursuing someone.
Personality Trait.2: I have a joke for every occasion, especially occasions where humor is inappropriate.
Personality Trait.3: Flattery is my preferred trick for getting what I want.
Personality Trait.4: I'm a born gambler who can't resist taking a risk for a potential payoff.
Personality Trait.5: I lie about almost everything, even when there's no good reason to.
Personality Trait.6: Sarcasm and insults are my weapons of choice.

Ideal.1: Independence. I am a free spirit—no one tells me what to do. (Chaotic)
Ideal.2: Fairness. I never target people who can't afford to lose a few coins. (Lawful)
Ideal.3: Charity. I distribute the money I acquire to the people who really need it. (Good)
Ideal.4: Creativity. I never run the same con twice. (Chaotic)
Ideal.5: Friendship. Material goods come and go. Bonds of friendship last forever. (Good)
Ideal.6: Aspiration. I'm determined to make something of myself. (Any)

Bond.1: I fleeced the wrong person and must work to ensure that this individual never crosses paths with me or those I care about.
Bond.2: I owe everything to my mentor—a horrible person who's probably rotting in jail somewhere.
Bond.3: Somewhere out there, I have a child who doesn't know me. I'm making the world better for him or her.
Bond.4: I come from a noble family, and one day I'll reclaim my lands and title from those who stole them from me.
Bond.5: A powerful person killed someone I love. Some day soon, I'll have my revenge.
Bond.6: I'm going to be the best at what I do. I'll do anything to prove myself superior to my hated rival.

Flaw.1: I can't resist a pretty face.
Flaw.2: I'm always in debt. I spend my ill-gotten gains on decadent luxuries faster than I bring them in.
Flaw.3: I'm convinced that no one could ever fool me the way I fool others.
Flaw.4: I'm too greedy for my own good. I can't resist taking a risk if there's money involved.
Flaw.5: I can't resist swindling people who are more powerful than me.
Flaw.6: I hate to admit it and will hate myself for it, but I'll run and preserve my own hide if the going gets tough.
